Project Links

Article (app has been removed from the app store)

Verizon Lost Elf Storybook

Free storybook app for families during the 2011 Holiday season

We wanted to create something for Verizon for the holidays that didn't involve selling more phones. The app was designed with families with young children in mind, and tied into the 2011 Holiday sales campaign.

For this project, I

  • Created holiday and storybook app download flow
  • Designed app functionality flow and experience
  • Storyboarding and narrative integration
  • Worked closely with designers and developers to integrate story with interface
Sample screenshots from the development process and final site
